content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the garbage and movement in the northern sky caught my eye.  i saw two lights spiraling around each other, orbiting a center point.  the lights then seperated and one light hovered and the other turned into what looked like 6 smaller lights which formed an equilateral triangle.  the traingle then rotated around a center axis a few rotations and then they kind of just closed in on each other and disappeared.  the other large light in the sky also disappeared.  it all happened really fast and thats as best as i can explain what i saw.  fwiw this is the first time i have ever seen any ufos before.
content.summary: Two spiraling lights transforming into triangle which rotated around central axis

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my friend in copperas cove texas when we noticed a large green object moving slowly across the sky. it was around midnight so i thought kt was just a plane but it was too close to the ground and not as large as one. it was a really bright green i was surprised no one else stopped to look at it really it was that strange. it seemed to have a flame trail behind it and shaped kinda like oval. i stopped to tale a picture to but then it just vanished in a blink of a eye. i was very baffled by this because there was a car behind me but i don't think they saw it and i don't think my friend noticed the ufo either
content.summary: Bight green helicopter size no sound and had a flame-like trail

content.detailedDescription: i was going south going home on coast highway, i looked up over the encines power plant there was a orange orb moving very slow north  over 300 feet smoke stack. it was solid orange, round to egg shape and was hovering then move slowly  around. the object max 30 feet long and no sounds.
content.summary: I was going south on coast hyway going home and orange object above the encines powerplant

content.detailedDescription:
Thought it was mercury or venus very bright star no clouds visible last night! all sky clear!
i,told husband look at that big bright star. i,said its a planet becuz it does not twinkle its stationary!!! then after like 10-15 min.. outside saw this bright star.. shut-off!!!! then turn back on!!! i was startled told husband omg look it turned off!!! he said wow thats strange!!!
this happned like 3-4 times after just being stationary for a long while we have seen reports of strange other lights.. around this area.. also saw strange lights last year.. several other witnesses these lights are mathematical immpossible to move or be still this way!!! this was no air-plane or helicopter or jet... i,thought maybe its a satelite however the way the lights look previousley last year they were like stars but moving at fast light speeds,,, almost either a super huge aircraft/spaceship or dancing stars becuz their have been massive reports of these sighting in our area...My question is was last nights star/like light a star,planet,ship,or human made satelite plz can anybody explain this.. what could it have been??
content.summary: Strange! star,like,bright,did not twinkle suddenly turned off& star stationary for longgg

content.detailedDescription: Two orbs one white one green
content.summary: One white one green second time i se this in this weekk

content.detailedDescription: Riding bike south, i only noticed it because it had no blinking lights like a normal aircraft would and was traveling slightly faster then than an airplane would, also made no sound. the color was not white but was not yellow either, in less than a minute it was out of sight.
content.summary: Steady white light no airplane lights

content.detailedDescription: Last night on the sky above sabac - serbia,my friend and some other people have seen about 50 ufo in small formations.We are still scared. i have 33 photos all some kind of dots and lines,only on one that i have from my cellphone is strange circle. this is not joke, i am serious 49 years old man.I have never experienced something like this in my life.
content.summary: Like orenge stars

content.detailedDescription:
I was stopped at a red light heading home when something caught my attention out of the corner of my eye. above a store, i saw two bright green lights, a little bit larger than your average star in the night sky. at first, i thought it was lights reflecting across my windshield before i remembered that i was stopped and no one was on the road around me. 
 the first one was moving at a steady fast pace and the second one was moving at the same pace. both left a small tail, sort of like a shooting star. the second orb suddenly increased in speed, like playing chase with the first light. 

when the second light caught up to the first, the both instantly disappeared. 

the whole event probably lasted about a second. 

after i realized what had happened and the fact that i know of nothing that moved that fast across the sky, i was certain it was something extraterrestrial.
content.summary: Two bright green lights, separate, moved super fast across the sky before quickly disappearing

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting out back of my father in laws house. noticed a bright object that looked like a star. this object moved to the ne at what seemed to be a slow pace. appearing behind it two more objects of same appearance, both moving at similar speed. of these two, the object behind passed and half circled the first. then a fourth object of the same appearance appeared towards the first object, all moving to ne. started to notice three to four different objects below the original that were flickering and falling to the ground, separate from original objects. had a passenger airline fly past around the time of the event heading e. objects headed ne to no longer visible. falling debris visible until blocked by trees and houses.
content.summary: Total of 4 objects, one passing around another, then reflective material falling

content.detailedDescription: Setting and watching tv. in the living room looked out window and saw a bright yellow- flame type of light in the sky. thought it looked odd so i went outside to see what it was. then i was a formation with 15 in smaller formations of 3. the groups of 3 moved in different directions but maintained the same overall group movement. when i realized what i was seeing i ran up and woke my wife and both of us watched them for over 10 min before they all moved of to the east. they all changed shape. you could see beings in the lights. they were very bright.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle
content.summary: Saw one outside of north window then founf over 15 in sky on 2nd look

content.detailedDescription: Was driving north on i65 at about 1030am south of seymour and observed a white pill shaped object up and to the left in my front window. it was going west and it turned reflected turned again and reflected. then it started going from west to east and picking up speed i looked down to note the time and looked back up and it was gone. i looked everywhere in the sky and saw nothing. there were no clouds in the sky. ive never seen anything do that before. i drive the route every saturday and every other sunday. im also prior military and seen nothing like that.
content.summary: White object

content.detailedDescription:
First and foremost i want to make this clear! i am not looking for publicity. i don't care what anyone thinks about me. and i don't care if people think i'm crazy. i just want to know the truth. my mom, step dad and me saw a lot of strange lights in the sky almost every night in the summer of 1998 or maybe 1999. sorry but i really  cant remember the year.
a lot happened before and after that. but the night i saw the big red light come up and over the tree's is a night i will never forget (or never remember). because that's all i remember. the big red light came up over the tree's and was moving toward me and i cant remember anything after that. before that night my mom and i both had waking dreams of someone standing over us and we couldn't move. i have a lot more to talk about but don't want to on here. i really hope you don't think i'm crazy or making this up.
content.summary: Big red, or orange red ball of light rising above trees coming toward me.
Woke up. saw figures looking down @ me. saw table thru transparent looking craft floor

content.detailedDescription: Saw 2 lights and one light disappeared when i went and got my bf.  the other light changed colors and then it went straight up and vanished.
content.summary: Saw 2 lights. went and got bf and one light disappeared and the other went straight up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My mom was picking me up from a friend's house and then she td me to hurry to the car because she wanted me to see something so i did and she asked me what is that?! they were like stars but i knew they weren't they were ufos and i know this because rhey were red and orangy like burning fire embers just staring at us then they were slowly disapearing but going up into the sky first there was 10 then they were leaving then 10 more came then they started vanishing then there was 3 then 1 then finally none. my reaction was this is it, we're done here.
content.summary: The ufos looked like burning fire embers, but were going up in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside walking my dog and i was looking at the nice clear night sky when i noticed an object approaching from the southeast at about 500 feet. i continued to watch it as it flew over me toward the northwest in a descending straight path at maybe a 15 m.P.H. pace. as it was getting closer as it was descending i observed what looked like a tubular triangle frame with what clearly looked like a fireball in the center as wide as the frame glowing in red, orange and yellow. there was not a whisper of sound. at first i thought it was a hot air balloon until i was able to see that there was no balloon or any type of basket attached. as the object was moving away it went over a tree line about 1500 ft. away from me. then, it looked like it just dropped out of the sky and disappeared.

i thought to myself as this was transpiring, is this real?, is this a ufo?. i felt kind of excited about it at the same time feeling puzzled as 64 thousand question go through my mind.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo with fireball in center

content.detailedDescription:
22.15
while relaxing in the garden of our house we (3 people) noticed a glowing orange object traversing the sky from east to west in a straight line without any sound.

22.20
we sight a second identical object with the same trajectory.
this time i took a video. (see attachment 1)
i was standing up therfore the object seems moving strangely, but it kept a straight traiectory all the time.
in the video the object seems blinking sometimes because it was behind some trees (wich is not visible because of the dark and poor quality of the camera), but it never flashed or anything.
after that an airplane (im almost sure because i heard the classic turbolence of a far airplane) with three flashing lights v shaped went by in perpendicular direction, only 2 light visible in the video. (see attachment 2).

22.30
another orange object, same trajectory.
it was probably more low and the video is clearer. (see attachment 3)
after that there were at least 3 airplanes (and turbolence sounds) with the same three flashing lights wandering (they could change direction) at east (the origin of the orange objects).

22.40
a person told me he saw another orange object from south-east that changed quicly trajectory and vanished but i couldn't see it.

22.45 - 00.00
no more airplanes or objects.
content.summary: At least 3 consecutive flying orange globes

content.detailedDescription:
My partner was outside on the balcony smoking and called me outside to look at an object.  it was at 10:55 pm - i remember looking at my clock.  the object was bright and reddish orange in color.  it came directly overhead at a 90 degree angle, coming from the west going east in a straight line (the balcony faces east).  the object was completely silent and unlike typical traffic departing from o'hare (no strobes, no sound).

the object was moving under the clouds and then ascended into a cloud.  it was no longer visible.  

the sighting lasted about 10 seconds, but it was of note because it was so different from the usual commercial traffic in the area.  i would guess that the speed was about the same as a twin engine aircraft, but not slow like a chinese latern.  from our vantage point, it seemed smaller than a commercial jet but bigger than a microwave.  it was bigger in appearance than a star but smaller than an aspirin.  as it gently ascended, i'd almost swear it had a saturn-like appearance on the right and left sides (probably just an atmospheric illusion).  the object was very bright when visible.

i don't know if this is the same object reported in case #49239, but it is similar, though it happened later in the evening.
content.summary: Red-orange orb similar to park ridge sighting #49239

content.detailedDescription: Watching t.V.About 10 p.M., caught it out of the side of my eye ,a very bright ball of yellow orange light several hundred feet high moving slowly seemed to halt but moving in a straight line moving west. turned off sound on set to hear any sounds, windows wide opened ;not like a plan ,too slow ,no correct lights or a helicopter again not usual lights just hovering . thought it might be the glow of a gas flame of a balloon but too late and too straight.Road curves around to town but this object just moved slowly could be seen easily and for along time.No edges just a glowing ball ,can not give actuate dimensions maybe 2 feet. feelings --amazement,mentally looking for explanations no reasonable object, cast no light beam, just keep on watching it for several minutes as it faded from view but that was a long way over the st. lawrence ,i have a huge view ,can see wolf island 18 miles away .The object was a long way off to lose sight of it .If a hoax - why, no reason not alot to see it. next day asked neighbour next day but his t.V. room was in wrong direction.Sorry to stunned to look for camera.I live on a peninsula facing halstead bay just off the parkway ,gananoque is 6 klm away west ,brockville is 40 klms and the international bridge is about 9 klms east a very clear view.
content.summary: Bright orange ball of light moving slow seemed to stop following highway. saw it out of my porch window ,followed it for some time ,very bright.

content.detailedDescription: Appears in nw 50 to 60 degrees above horizon at 9pm moving slightly more north. bright white light decends by 9:30pm to horizon. reappears around midnight in same area with multicolors and tight movements. larger then stars in the same area. doesn't appear when clouds are present. viewed through 50mm binoculors in backyard. object present for the past month. first thought it was the planet venus, but does not appear as a planet or star.
content.summary: Appears at 9pm and decends at 9:30pm, reappears around 12pm with vibrant colors and movement and decends within 1/2 hr if no cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
Two star-like orbs moved across the sky while circling each other and continually combining into one super orb, then separating into two orbs, over and over again. while separated they constantly circled one another very closely. i watched them move across the sky while doing this for 15 minutes before they suddenly disappeared. i find it hard to believe  that these are satellites because of the fact that it was broad day light at 3pm in los angeles which is one of the smoggiest cities in the world. smog was bad that day. they were pretty much straight up in the sky... slightly more north though, moving from west to east.

i happened to be laying on my roof staring at the sky, and the second i saw them, i knew they were not planes or helicopters, and because of these orb's actions and behavior i definitely felt like they were ufos, i was deeply moved and emotional. i actually started to cry.

i tried to film it on my phone but the orbs were too far away to capture.
content.summary: Two orbs circling one another, continually combining into one orb then separating into two while moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke when the cat jumped to a start at1:45 am on a wednesday morning. he was looking up and out the window at an enormous triangle craft gliding by    (only see the underside). it was covered entirely on the underside with white and blue white lights . ( hundreds).It continued in its way , making no sound until it disappeared from view. it seemed to be very low.
when i awoke in the morning it had carved a huge path through the clouds. it had moved in a straight line from the southwest to the northeast, over my building. i was shocked at the enormous size of the craft,could have fit many, many commercial jets in this triangle. it completely blocked out two 23 inch windows as it went by.
content.summary: Lying in bed observed large triangle moving silently southwest to northeast, blocking out two 23inch windows as it glided by

content.detailedDescription: had taken a friend up to pontoosac lake in pittsfield to sit at the picnic tables and just hang out. at about 9:50 i observed an orange light with a red halo moving at moderate speed from south to north. i watched it coming over and as an aviation enthusiast it really caught my eye...It was very bright. i thought it might be an f-15 out of westfield but there were none of the other lights or strobes that you can normally see when they fly over (if you can see them at all...High altitude).I thought it was a little odd but didn't pay much attention and didn't bother pointing it out to my companion. within about 30 seconds of it passing behind the trees and out of my sight i noticed 2 more flying in formation. it was very hard to tell size, speed, or altitude as it was very dark. i noticed that as they passed overhead the lights dimmed to almost nothing and it was also at this time i realized they weren't making any sound and i pointed this out to my friend. at this point we began speculating on what they could be and the 4th appeared trailing some distance behind 2 and 3. all on pretty much the same flight path. as she started getting a little nervous i observed the 5th coming in from the west on what appeared to be an intercept course but this one dimmed before it crossed the flight path of the others. seconds later the 6th and final object appeared on the same heading as the first 4. none of them made any sound and the whole incident lasted about 5 or 6 minutes and not a sound could be heard. also interesting to note that a private single engine aircraft flew over from west to east within moments of the others, but was easily identified by its red, blue lights and white strobe and engine noise. this is my 3rd experience but first reporting.
content.summary: 5 orange lights w/red halos moving south to north in loose/staggered formation. 6th came from the west to join up.

content.detailedDescription: I was having lunch with my wife at the torrey pines glider port and i snapped a few photos of the parasailers with my fuji x100 camera. a few days later when i downloaded the images onto my computer i noticed a dark smudge in 1 frame of my images. the image was made with a fuji x100 camera which has a fixed lens and is sealed to outside elements which ruled out dust or dirty sensor. i have no idea what it is but appears to be moving at a high rate of speed and appears to be below the clouds.
content.summary: Torrey pines glider port object

content.detailedDescription: My son, daughter-inlaw, myself and 3 grandchildren were outside on the patio sitting around the fireplace, the kids were playing in the yard. i was sitting facing the yard toward the se... i saw what i at first thought was a helicopter... but it was to big and made no sound at all, i got up out of my chair for a better look and observed this very large triangle shaped object with orange-red lights, i called to my son and daughter inlaw and they then saw it too as well as the kids. at first it was gliding very slowly toward us then just hovered for several minutes, it was partially obscured by the trees so we ran out into the street to get a better view we did continue to see it for a few more seconds and then it just dissapeared. we got in the car to see if we could find it again but we did not see it again.My son estimated it to be about several football fields in size. this is the first time any of us have ever seen a ufo. there is absolutely no doubt as to what we saw!We do not know if anyone else saw this thing, it was so huge i cannot believe we would be the only ones to see it but we did not see anything on the news about it. we were all feeling kind of surreal.
content.summary: Family outside on patio..3 adults 3 children all saw event

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were driving south towards denver international airport. i turned to look towards the east and i saw a very large object in the middle of the sky. i pointed it out to my mom. it was a copper color. i know it sounds strange but it looked like someone had cut out a giant piece of metal and taped it up in the sky. it didn't move and wasn't attached to anything. it jus floated there for as long as we could see it. it was shaped like a rectangle but slanted on one side. no noise. i dont know how else to explain it. it was so strange!
content.summary: Driving south near dia saw giant metal object in middle of sky to the eastm

content.detailedDescription: Was watching the fire works ovea the park and saw the ufo was wacthing as well.It capt moving arond as if to get a better view.I knew it was a ufo as soon as i saw it just a small white object not scard at all i love to see them just gone after an hour.
content.summary: Was watching the fire works over the park for about an hour.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend who'd had recent sightings called to say he was viewing something at his location (nearby) and i should get up and come see. i went outside to look, but couldn't see what he was viewing due to terrain and trees, so i decided to drive the mile or so to his location and take a look. before leaving, i grabbed my best pair of binoculars; a military-like pair of steiner "predator" series (12x40).

when i arrived, he said what he'd been seeing was now behind a cloud and for me/us (another friend was with him) to be patient and it'd come out from behind the cloud.

well, it didn't. but, i still decided to stay for awhile and sky-watch. it was a beautiful night with excellent visibility. the slight cloud cover was clearing nicely and was exclusively southward. the skies to the north and east were completely clear, however.

we saw a couple satellites and several planes - mostly smaller craft, but a few high-flying airliners, too. i was just about to head home when i noticed a bright amber-orangish light to my left (we were facing almost due east). the light was far brighter (and larger) than any visible stars or planets and moved in the straightest line i'd ever seen an aircraft move (or, whatever it was). i called out to my friends and we all saw it. it'd have been impossible to miss!

i then remembered i had my binos around my neck and raised them to get a good view. i had already prepped them when i arrived (this model has eye-pieces which focus independent of each-other and, once properly focused, see to infinity), so all i had to do was raise them to my eyes and the object was crystal clear.

it immediately became obvious, though, that i was not actually looking at one object - but, two. they were identical (as best as i could determine) and flying right next to each-other, west to east. they didn't really "pulsate", but they did increase in brightness every few seconds - but, the interval didn't seem to be consistent. they would get bright (not exactly "flash", though - simply brighten for a moment), then return to their previous level of brightness. 

the lights continued their direction of travel and did not change course. they were not going particularly fast, but the distance, size, altitude and actual speed were all impossible to determine as it was night time and there was really no way to be sure. they didn't stop and they didn't cast light on anything. they only continued on their easterly course - but, again, the laser-straight way they were moving seemed unnatural somehow.

i'd told my friends we were, in fact, seeing two objects and they wanted to see it/them through the binos, so i passed them around so everyone could get a quick look. (i do remember measuring their height above the horizon at this point and they were just over two extended fist high.) i got my binoculars back and was watching only about another ten seconds or so when the lights faded out. i'm not sure how to describe how that happened, though! it was almost as though i was suddenly looking at them through a "screen" or something which interfered with my ability to see them. 

it really is hard to describe. to say they just dimmed isn't correct because it seemed something was "in the way". that "something" became more and more opaque until i could no longer see them. to my friends seeing this with just the naked eye, it appeared the lights simply faded out, but i could see far, far better with the binos and that's not what happened. i guess you could say it was as though they were flying into a denser and denser cloud until disappearing from sight, but there were no clouds anywhere near them! (believe me, i looked!)

anyway, that's about it. we continued looking for several minutes, but the lights did not return. 

now, i should probably add, however, that i'd seen these same lights twice before (or, what appeared to be the same light(s)). once about a month prior to this, more lasting, dramatic sighting (recounted above) and the other time a week or so before that. i was home one time and driving, the other. during both of those sightings, the lights were traveling due south. the first time, while driving, i had been watching them move from directly perpendicular to my direction of travel to across my front. they were moving about the same speed as i describe above, but i didn't get to see them "disappear". i lost them behind some trees when the road curved and by the time the road curved back, they were gone. 

they must have either "faded" as i saw them do above, or they zipped off. i say this because there was nothing blocking my field of view after the road turned back, yet they (or it) were gone. both these sightings occurred just after dark. the night i was driving it was raining and there wasn't another light visible in the sky: none. the second time, the light(s) went behind the trees at my property and i lost sight of them that way. that night was clear and the sighting only lasted approximately 20 seconds.

i have not seen them since.
content.summary: Two bright amber balls of light flew in laser-straight line west to east then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
1:) at a mates house, heading towards backyard, whilst approaching the back screen door i a happened to notice the object.

2:) strange object in the sky, completely unusual to see, not a conventional vehicle or anything known to be operated to human knowledge.

3:) either military re-engineered downed spacecraft, or alien craft. 

4:) stationary when i noticed it and after capturing image of it on my ipod touch, when trying to change to video capture mode the object took off at incredible speeds. nothing to what i know any of the current machines man possesses is capable of.

4: stunned, unsure of whether seeing such a thing was really happening, as i know now, that isn't the case. 

5:) it took off at enormous speeds straight up into the sky.
content.summary: Silver metallic disk ( saucer ) object

content.detailedDescription: Six orange objects with a black dot in the center suddenly appeared and hovered in the sky at night shaped like the upenn emblem and dissappeared one by one. another individual visiting the sherman oaks area  witnessed the same and wondered what the objects were. like me, she was taking pictures with her smart phone. i was on my balcony when they all just appeared out of no where flying in the sky (north west) long enough for me to grab my iphone to take two pictures. tried to take pictures of the remaining two objects in the sky, but for some reason they were not visible in my iphone like the others were that i took on my iphone. the other individual who witnessed the same had parked her car on the street and was coming to visit a friend of hers. her friend came outside and she showed her friend the pictures she took and told her friend i had witnessed the same. amazing. for some reason, i am unable to upload the pictures from my iphone but i had a witness to this event. when they first appeared, i saw a strobe light and heard a fireworks sound.
content.summary: Six orange objects with a black dot in center hovering in sky at night shaped like upenn emblem and dissappeared one by one.
